title: Device Orientation
description: Data indicating changes to their orientation with relation to the pull of gravity.

alpha.title: Alpha
alpha.description: The z-axis rotation of the device, in degrees, around the z-axis. This value represents the compass direction the device is facing.

beta.title: Beta
beta.description: The x-axis rotation of the device, in degrees, around the x-axis. This value represents the front-to-back tilt of the device.

gamma.title: Gamma
gamma.description: The y-axis rotation of the device, in degrees, around the y-axis. This value represents the left-to-right tilt of the device.

absolute.title: Absolute
absolute.description: A boolean value that indicates whether the device's orientation is provided as relative to the Earth's coordinate system or as relative to the device's coordinate system.
